title: Guys who hustle with the "Free RP" sites
body: I think that if we had a name of someone who does this he should get reported from League Of Legends

replies.body: Witch-hunting is forbidden on the boards/forums. Please inquire your local medieval village.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=jEkKPcI7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-28T02:11:02.019+0000)
>
> Witch-hunting is forbidden on the boards/forums. Please inquire your local medieval village.

lol
I believe there is a strong no "Name and Shame" policy. If you want to report someone it is completely fine, but you're just not allowed to reveal their I.G.N / Identity on the forums / boards.
Well if you want to report them go ahead, no one's stopping you.
May not be the best because my friend got hacked by one of these sites and the site owner started sending out the link to his site through the the account to his friends
